experience: You and Doug both know Adwait Ullal, Yacov Wrocherinsky, and 5 others

Marinforce.com is a boutique consultancy founded by former Big 4 consultants focused on delivering business solutions on the Salesforce.com platform. Our consultants are Salesforce.com certified and have at least 10 years of technology experience. With over 100 successful projects and counting learn why clients like Restoration Hardware, FireEye, Exar Corporation, and Wells Fargo choose to work with us.

Solution architect responsible for the design, development, and implementation of a complex student relationship management solution built entirely on the Salesforce platform.  Business functions delivered in this initial phase include custom pricing and discounting, tour management, admissions, waitlisting, online application, campus configuration, capacity planning, club management, after school care management, enrollment, change management, irregular placement, and payment.  Native salesforce functionality included over 50 custom objects and 75 flows (flows, workflows, processes).  Sales Cloud, Communities

Architect and business analyst responsible for designing and implementing improvements to Minted's service platform (e-commerce/web, Service Cloud , inContact, and LiveAgent).  Refactored all service channels to align with simplified data model centered on the customer, from ordering through servicing. Cleansed legacy data and implemented validation and duplicate blocking strategy using Cloudingo.  Architected integration with e-commerce for customer and order data, and worked with engineering team to implement via web services.  Salesforce.com Service Cloud, inContact, LiveAgent, Cloudingo.
Solvis Consulting (subcontract) at Universidad del Valle de México (client)

Technical advisor and solution architect responsible for project architecture including marketing automation , call center integration, and on premise legacy system integration.     Led on site workshops covering environment management, release management, change management, data volume, security, mobile, backup strategy, governance, integration design, reporting, and governance. Salesforce.com, SF1, Ellucian's Banner Student Information System, Gigya, Hubspot, Tibco, vendor  plugins and custom web services.

Doug has tremendous energy and capability. As a consultant in the initial design and as the eventual head of the Projects Competency Center, he firmly established a stellar reputation for driving to results based in large part on his ability to stretch and motivate his team (including myself and the executives) to question the status quo and make the kinds of changes that would yield real benefits and results. Simply put; he has very strong leadership capabilities, a wide range of expertise, and his outlook is always (refreshingly) positive. I thoroughly enjoyed working with Doug and look forward to working with him again anytime.

summary: Big 4 consulting veteran with 20 years of experience solving clients critical business challenges through the thoughtful application of technology.  Currently leading a boutique consultancy focused on helping clients implement, integrate, and optimize Salesforce.com.Hands-on practitioner certified as Salesforce.com Administrator, Force.com Developer,  Sales Cloud Consultant, and Service Cloud Consultant.  Certified Scrum Master (CSM) and Project Management Professional (PMP).   Deep business analysis and requirement gathering skills with multiple sales cloud, marketing cloud, service cloud, communities, and mobile implementations.  Exceptional communication and problem solving skills.
